storyTitle: As Employee, I want to view my notification history to achieve better tracking of past updates

testCases.title: Verify employee can access notification history for the last 30 days
preconditions: Employee account is created and active in the system
Employee has valid login credentials
Employee has received at least 5 notifications within the last 30 days
Notification history database is accessible
System is up and running

steps.action: Navigate to the system login page
steps.expectedResult: Login page is displayed with username and password fields

steps.action: Enter valid employee credentials and click Login button
steps.expectedResult: Employee is successfully authenticated and redirected to the dashboard

steps.action: Locate and click on the Notification History menu option or icon
steps.expectedResult: Notification History page is displayed

steps.action: Observe the list of notifications displayed on the page
steps.expectedResult: All notifications from the last 30 days are displayed in chronological order with date, time, and notification summary

steps.action: Verify the date range of notifications displayed
steps.expectedResult: All notifications shown are within the last 30 days from current date, no notifications older than 30 days are visible

steps.action: Check the page load time from step 3 to step 4
steps.expectedResult: Notification history loads and displays within 2 seconds

postconditions: Employee remains logged into the system
Notification history page is displayed with all notifications from last 30 days
No data is modified in the system

testCases.title: Verify search functionality for specific notifications within history
preconditions: Employee is logged into the system
Employee has access to notification history page
Multiple notifications exist in the history with different content and keywords
At least one notification contains the keyword 'meeting' in the last 30 days

steps.action: Navigate to the Notification History page
steps.expectedResult: Notification History page is displayed with list of notifications and search functionality visible

steps.action: Locate the search input field on the notification history page
steps.expectedResult: Search input field is visible and enabled for text entry

steps.action: Enter the keyword 'meeting' in the search field
steps.expectedResult: Text 'meeting' is entered in the search field

steps.action: Click the Search button or press Enter key
steps.expectedResult: Search is executed and results are filtered

steps.action: Review the filtered notification list
steps.expectedResult: Only notifications containing the keyword 'meeting' are displayed in the results

steps.action: Clear the search field and verify results
steps.expectedResult: All notifications from the last 30 days are displayed again without filters

postconditions: Search functionality is working correctly
Employee can view filtered or unfiltered notification history
No notifications are deleted or modified

testCases.title: Verify notification details are displayed clearly and accurately
preconditions: Employee is logged into the system
Employee has navigated to the Notification History page
At least one notification exists in the history with complete details (title, message, timestamp, sender)

steps.action: View the list of notifications in the notification history
steps.expectedResult: List of notifications is displayed with summary information for each notification

steps.action: Select a specific notification from the list by clicking on it
steps.expectedResult: Notification is highlighted or selected, and detailed view is opened

steps.action: Review the notification details displayed
steps.expectedResult: Complete notification details are shown including: notification title, full message content, date and time sent, sender information, and notification type

steps.action: Verify the timestamp format and accuracy
steps.expectedResult: Timestamp is displayed in readable format (e.g., DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM) and matches the actual time the notification was sent

steps.action: Check the readability and formatting of the notification content
steps.expectedResult: Text is clearly readable with appropriate font size, proper spacing, and correct formatting without any truncation or display issues

steps.action: Close the notification detail view
steps.expectedResult: Detail view closes and user returns to the notification history list

postconditions: Notification details are accurately displayed
Employee can view complete information for any notification
User interface remains responsive and clear

testCases.title: Verify user can delete notifications from their history
preconditions: Employee is logged into the system
Employee has navigated to the Notification History page
At least 3 notifications exist in the employee's notification history
Employee has permission to delete notifications from their own history

steps.action: View the notification history list and count the total number of notifications
steps.expectedResult: Notification list is displayed with at least 3 notifications, total count is noted

steps.action: Select a notification to delete by clicking on it or hovering over it
steps.expectedResult: Notification is selected and delete option/button becomes visible

steps.action: Click on the Delete button or delete icon for the selected notification
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation dialog appears asking 'Are you sure you want to delete this notification?'

steps.action: Click Confirm or Yes button in the confirmation dialog
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation dialog closes and notification is removed from the list

steps.action: Verify the notification is no longer visible in the history list
steps.expectedResult: Deleted notification is not displayed in the list, total count is reduced by 1

steps.action: Refresh the notification history page
steps.expectedResult: Page refreshes and the deleted notification remains absent from the list, confirming permanent deletion

postconditions: Selected notification is permanently deleted from employee's history
Remaining notifications are still visible and accessible
Total notification count is updated correctly

testCases.title: Verify notification history does not display notifications older than 30 days
preconditions: Employee is logged into the system
Test data includes notifications that are exactly 30 days old, 31 days old, and within the last 30 days
System date and time are correctly configured
Notification history database contains notifications spanning more than 30 days

steps.action: Navigate to the Notification History page
steps.expectedResult: Notification History page is displayed with list of notifications

steps.action: Review all notifications displayed and note the oldest notification date
steps.expectedResult: All notifications displayed have dates within the last 30 days from current date

steps.action: Verify that notifications exactly 30 days old are visible
steps.expectedResult: Notifications that are exactly 30 days old from current date are displayed in the list

steps.action: Attempt to search or scroll for notifications older than 30 days
steps.expectedResult: No notifications older than 30 days are found or displayed in the history

steps.action: Check if there is any option or filter to view notifications older than 30 days
steps.expectedResult: No option exists to view notifications beyond the 30-day limit

postconditions: Only notifications within 30-day window are accessible
System enforces the 30-day retention policy correctly
No data integrity issues are present

testCases.title: Verify notification history requires user authentication
preconditions: Employee account exists in the system
Employee is not currently logged into the system
Notification history page URL is known
Security authentication is enabled on the system

steps.action: Open a web browser and ensure no user is logged into the system
steps.expectedResult: Browser is open with no active user session

steps.action: Attempt to directly access the notification history page by entering the URL (e.g., /notifications/history)
steps.expectedResult: Access is denied and user is redirected to the login page

steps.action: Verify that an appropriate error message or authentication prompt is displayed
steps.expectedResult: Message displayed: 'Please log in to access this page' or 'Authentication required'

steps.action: Enter valid employee credentials on the login page
steps.expectedResult: Employee is successfully authenticated and logged into the system

steps.action: Navigate to the notification history page after successful login
steps.expectedResult: Notification history page is accessible and displays the employee's notification history

postconditions: Unauthorized access to notification history is prevented
Security authentication is enforced correctly
Authenticated users can access their notification history

testCases.title: Verify notification history loads within 2 seconds performance requirement
preconditions: Employee is logged into the system
Employee's notification history contains at least 20 notifications
Network connection is stable with normal bandwidth
System is under normal load conditions
Performance monitoring tool or browser developer tools are available

steps.action: Open browser developer tools and navigate to the Network tab
steps.expectedResult: Developer tools are open and Network tab is active for monitoring

steps.action: Clear browser cache and refresh the page to ensure clean test
steps.expectedResult: Cache is cleared and page is ready for fresh load

steps.action: Start timer and click on the Notification History menu option
steps.expectedResult: Navigation to notification history is initiated and timer is running

steps.action: Monitor the page load time until notification history is fully displayed
steps.expectedResult: Notification history page loads completely with all notifications visible

steps.action: Stop timer and record the total load time from click to full display
steps.expectedResult: Total load time is recorded and is 2 seconds or less

steps.action: Review the Network tab to verify API response time for GET /api/notifications/history
steps.expectedResult: API endpoint responds successfully with status 200 and contributes to overall load time within acceptable limits

postconditions: Performance requirement of 2 seconds load time is met
Notification history is fully functional after load
System performance is within acceptable parameters

testCases.title: Verify employee can only view their own notification history
preconditions: Two employee accounts exist: Employee A and Employee B
Both employees have notifications in their respective histories
Employee A is logged into the system
User permission validation is enabled

steps.action: Log in as Employee A with valid credentials
steps.expectedResult: Employee A is successfully logged into the system

steps.action: Navigate to the Notification History page
steps.expectedResult: Notification history page is displayed showing Employee A's notifications

steps.action: Review all notifications displayed and verify ownership
steps.expectedResult: All notifications displayed belong to Employee A only, no notifications from other employees are visible

steps.action: Attempt to manipulate URL parameters to access Employee B's notification history (e.g., change user ID in URL)
steps.expectedResult: Access is denied with error message 'Unauthorized access' or user is redirected to their own notification history

steps.action: Verify that no API calls can retrieve other employees' notification data
steps.expectedResult: API endpoint GET /api/notifications/history returns only Employee A's notifications and rejects requests for other users' data

postconditions: Employee A can only access their own notification history
Security and privacy controls are functioning correctly
Unauthorized access attempts are blocked and logged

testCases.title: Verify notification history displays empty state when no notifications exist
preconditions: New employee account is created in the system
Employee has never received any notifications
Employee is logged into the system
Notification history database is accessible

steps.action: Log in as the new employee with no notification history
steps.expectedResult: Employee is successfully logged into the system

steps.action: Navigate to the Notification History page
steps.expectedResult: Notification History page loads successfully

steps.action: Observe the content displayed on the notification history page
steps.expectedResult: Empty state message is displayed such as 'No notifications found' or 'You have no notification history'

steps.action: Verify that the page layout and UI elements are properly displayed
steps.expectedResult: Page displays correctly with appropriate empty state icon or graphic, no errors or broken elements are visible

steps.action: Verify search functionality behavior with no notifications
steps.expectedResult: Search field is either disabled or returns 'No results found' message when used

postconditions: Empty state is handled gracefully with appropriate messaging
No errors occur when notification history is empty
User interface remains functional and user-friendly

testCases.title: Verify canceling delete operation does not remove notification from history
preconditions: Employee is logged into the system
Employee has navigated to the Notification History page
At least one notification exists in the history
Delete confirmation dialog is implemented in the system

steps.action: View the notification history list and select a specific notification to delete
steps.expectedResult: Notification is selected and delete option is visible

steps.action: Note the details of the selected notification (title, date, content)
steps.expectedResult: Notification details are recorded for verification

steps.action: Click on the Delete button for the selected notification
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation dialog appears asking 'Are you sure you want to delete this notification?' with Cancel and Confirm options

steps.action: Click the Cancel or No button in the confirmation dialog
steps.expectedResult: Confirmation dialog closes without deleting the notification

steps.action: Verify the notification is still present in the history list
steps.expectedResult: The notification remains in the list with all original details intact

steps.action: Refresh the page and verify the notification is still present
steps.expectedResult: After page refresh, the notification is still visible in the history confirming no deletion occurred

postconditions: Notification remains in the history unchanged
Cancel operation functions correctly
No unintended data modifications occur
